text: Emily Ratajkowski ’ s Cannes Bikini was a bold choice It ’ s become a quite common thing that actress keep on posting their bold appearance, though it can be considered as they are willing to do bold scenes on demand of the movie scripts it ’ s pretty clear that actresses are very much keen to entertain their fans by posting their hot images every now and then.
